title: Protein destroyer: Inducible E3-DART for targeted protein degradation in plants
content: The CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing system has revolutionized biology. It is most widely used to functionally deactivate genes by targeted mutation, something that would be classified as a pre-translational strategy. However, a powerful alternative to attenuate or eliminate gene functions at the post-translational stage is the targeted degradation of a protein of interest.
